DOC.brief_summary: Our infertility unit has started a clinic for women with rheumatological diseases. those women are prone to infertility problems and it might be due to their illness or cytotoxic treatment . In our study we are going to observe the effect of their disease on ovarian reserve. we will assess it by using intravaginal sonography and blood test such as hormonal profile and anti-mullerian hormone (AMH).
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Ovarian Reserve in Women With Rheumatologic Diseases
